name: core_arch::x86::avx::_mm256_cvtsi256_si32

intrinsics::simd::simd_extract.doc:
Extracts an element from a vector.

 `T` must be a vector with element type `U`, and `idx` must be `const`.

 # Safety

 `idx` must be const and in-bounds of the vector.

doc:
Returns the first element of the input vector of `[8 x i32]`.

 [Intel's documentation](https://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/docs/intrinsics-guide/index.html#text=_mm256_cvtsi256_si32)
